scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace root.drio dev" "yarn workspace saas.drio dev" "yarn workspace logistics-ui dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "yarn workspace root.drio start" "yarn workspace saas.drio start" "yarn workspace logistics-ui start"
scripts.dev:mock: concurrently "yarn workspace root.drio dev:mock" "yarn workspace saas.drio dev:mock" "yarn workspace logistics-ui dev:mock"
scripts.build: yarn workspace root.drio build && yarn workspace saas.drio build && yarn workspace logistics-ui build
